```{r}
outDataDir <- "output/data_generate"
```


```{r arguments}
nSample <- 100
nProbe  <- 1000
```


```{r functions}
generateBeta <- function(
    noise = 0, 
    name  = NULL,
    ns    = nSample,
    np    = nProbe) {
    reference <- rbeta(np , 0.1, 0.1)
    d <- sapply(1:ns, function(x) jitter(reference, noise))
    colnames(d) <- paste0(name, "_", 1:ns, "_", sample(1:24))
    rownames(d) <- paste0("probe_", 1:np)
    return(d)
}
```


```{r generateRandomData}
dCase <- generateBeta(5e2, "Case")
dCtrl <- generateBeta(1e3, "Control")
```


```{r saveData}
# Using predefined outDataDir object to save data
dir.create(outDataDir, recursive=T)
saveRDS(dCase,file=file.path(outDataDir,"saveData_dCase.RDS"))
saveRDS(dCtrl,file=file.path(outDataDir,"saveData_dCtrl.RDS"))
```
